name: Planet V: Jungle Warfare
description:
Download the PC build for higher resolution.

~~~~~~~~~~How to Play~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Your task is to clear out these Simiborgs from the jungle by any means necessary.

Use WASD / Arrow Keys to move

Space to throw out a Vortexstone

Any Key (except movement to activate the Vortexstone)

Press X when your job is complete and we'll send you to the next area.

Each area gets progressively harder, it really turns up the heat.

Good luck out there, everything is out to get you!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Criticism and feedback welcome! Hope you enjoy playing :D

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Known Jungle Species~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Simiborgs

Cybernetic monkeys. Kinda dumb, local pest.

Likes fruit.

Dislikes the player and Vinepers.

Vinepers

Carnivourous Plant and Snake Hybrids. Extremely lazy, often asleep and won't even snap their mouths shut.

They lay in wait and ambush all who come near.

Jungle Fruit

Famed for its healing and slightly anaesthetic properties. This fruit can increase the health of humans, it sends Simiborgs to sleep.

Jungle Peppers

The spiciness of these peppers really turn up the heat. They increase the motor capabilities of all who eat them. Banned from competitive sports.

Jungle Poison Fruit

This species is closely related to the Jungle Fruit but it's chemical composition harms instead of heals. It's almost identical in appearance, the main difference between the two is it's strong smell.

~~~~~~~~~Update: 14/09~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Added Peppers and Rotten Fruit

Peppers when eaten increase movement speed by 1.5x for 5 seconds.

Jungle Poison Fruit deal damage when eaten.

Minor UI improvements

Pc Build added.

~~~~~~~~~Update: 13/09~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Added Fruit

Fruit appear every few areas. Eating Fruit gives +1 hp up to a maximum of 12.

Simiborgs like fruit more than they want to destroy you, when they eat fruit, they will fall asleep.
